review: kiss my ass
Tracer

Original Overwatch 1 pre-purchase player here, i paid for that, not this, played it for quite a bit at release back in 2016 and after up to OW2 release.

OW2 is more like OW1.5
---
Fast forward a few years...

1) No real content for 3 years.

2) Heavily invested into microtransactions. 
(The company that made this game...is a Indie company...)

3) Grindy battlepass with daily quests you gotta complete that gives almost nothing.
(Other competitors games battle passes are more rewarding)

4) Very expensive skins, you can grind for the skins but it is going to take you a long time to do so.
(You can buy better games / multiple skins in other games for that price)

5) A real Pachimari keychain costs around 5€, while the in-game charm costs 700 Overwatch Coins (the equivalent of 7€).

6) Locked heroes, pay up, or grind the battle pass.

7) They cancelled PVE hero mode, now you got to pay for PVE missions, 15€ for the invasion bundle as time of writing.

8) Not really balanced, all it takes is 1 party member to die and you're probably done for the rest of the game as unable to push back.

9) All this game wants from you, is your wallet and 24/7 time grinding it.
---
TLDR: Go play something else.
《守望先锋》“归西”是一款差评如潮的团队观光游戏，舞台设定在黑暗的过去，有着不断退化的英雄阵容。现在就与锁子哥组队畅玩吧！
绑定做的依托答辩，游戏做的还就是那原汁原味完全没有见到玩法的创新，喜欢我5v5推车占点吗？新英雄出的更是比暴雪你家坟头草长的还慢，傻逼暴雪给我飞个马先
为 《守望先锋® 2》 撰写一篇评测
如果说2023年真的有一坨屎会放在我家门口那一定是暴雪干的，曾几何时我认为用一坨屎来形容一个公司是偏颇的，是过分的，但如果你说这坨屎是暴雪，那我会认为你说的对。实践是检验真理的唯一标准，所以我知道暴雪一定得死。爆炸是脑残暴雪的唯一出路，所以暴雪什么时候螺旋升天？

There's literally nothing that can be said about Activision, Blizzard, Activision Blizzard as a merged cancerous entity or Overwatch, that hasn't already been fucking said.

I've formed some of my favourite memories in an Overwatch title, collected cosmetics that are genuinely really fucking good in a certain Overwatch title, formed a friendship group which is still going strong half a fucking decade later, because of a certain Overwatch title.

And then along came Bobby fucking Kotick. His cancerous little adoring-fan looking fucking face, his corporate greed, and his seeming hate for women, given he threatened to kill one, and fucking ruined the very last part of Blizzard that was any fucking good.

Jeff Kaplan was the last thing holding the shell of the original Blizzard together. With him gone, his game, the "certain Overwatch title" died.
And was replaced with it's autistic slave cousin from 15 generations back when incest ran riot in its family.

Overwatch "2" is genuinely not a bad title. If you can truly look past the horrible microtransaction hellscape that whales have allowed to form in the industry, and are willing to put 0 money into the game, only to play it for the genuine moments of enjoyment that the game does actually still have to offer and to incur server costs at blizzard, then go for it. Play the game. As a videogame? I can recommend it. But i can ONLY recommend it on the basis that it is effectively a dishevelled corpse of a genuinely really fucking great title, and manages to have a few of its good qualities intact.

As a product? As something that you, a new player, should try??
Nah, I wouldn't. I know that if this game didn't appeal to me since 2016, I'd have left a long time ago. But the memories and friends mean a lot, and I cannot truly drop the game forever. But i'd fucking love to drop bobby forever. Fat cunt.

各位将军且随我一同杀敌，今日我们如果给守望先锋打好评，那下一个又会是谁呢？永劫无间？鬼谷八荒？不！将是我们自己啊，正如北地王所言“宁可战死失社稷绝不拱手让江山”，我不过是一名偏将军，一介匹夫，但是我听说有德行的人，大家都会尊重他，因为倘若九州有乱，他是能担当大任的人啊，而没有德行的人，大家都想杀了他，因为他是作乱的贼人啊。先帝素有贤德，天下诸侯如陶公亦或荆州牧都敬重他，而董卓失了大义，天下诸侯尽攻之。这就是德的力量啊。望诸位将军能暂时放下嫌隙，一同讨贼，以敬先帝遗志

TL;DR Blizzard no longer cares, OW2 Has lost its spirit, motive and passion, Play TF2.
Read extended if you want. 

I actively played overwatch 2 between season 1-4, launch day to one of the last of season 4, And I watched as blizzard made bad choice after bad choice, refusing to listen to their community and ruining the game more and more, day after day.

The downfall of a game that frankly I enjoyed before they did their big visual update and slapped a 2 on it.
The truth is the passion for OW2 has been lost and its soul motive is to keep the corporate profits up, And it's a sad fate but, I can't really be surprised. 

Bad balance choice after bad balance choice, issue after issue, and now the entire reason for a 2 being there is just.. gone. The game has lost its spirit and the game's devs are so extremely out of touch. I can't recommend OW2 despite playing it for so long, simply due to what they've done to it.

Go play TF2.

作为一个热爱游戏的玩家，我不得不在这里表达我对《守望先锋2》这款游戏的严重失望和差评。这款游戏无疑是我在Steam平台上的一次最糟糕的购买体验，以下是我对这款游戏的详细批评：

首先，游戏在技术方面存在严重问题。我在游玩过程中屡次遭遇了崩溃、卡顿和连接问题，这极大地影响了游戏的流畅性和可玩性。作为一款面向多人游戏的竞技射击，稳定的服务器和流畅的游戏体验是至关重要的，然而《守望先锋2》在这方面做得实在太差劲了。

其次，游戏的内容匮乏令人失望。与其前作相比，《守望先锋2》几乎没有带来任何创新和突破，新英雄和地图的数量少得可怜，而且它们的设计也毫无亮点可言。这导致游戏很快就陷入了单调和乏味，没有足够的内容来吸引玩家长时间投入。

另外，游戏的社区和玩家之间的互动几乎为零。开发者似乎对于玩家的反馈和建议置若罔闻，导致许多存在的问题得不到解决。这种缺乏沟通和互动的态度让玩家感到被忽视和冷落，进一步削弱了对游戏的兴趣和支持。

总之，我对《守望先锋2》的差评无法用言语来表达我的失望和愤怒。这款游戏在技术问题、内容创新以及与玩家的互动方面表现极为糟糕，完全不值得花费时间和金钱。我诚挚地希望游戏开发方能够认真反思并采取
As an avid gamer, I feel compelled to express my profound disappointment and utter disdain for Overwatch 2, a game that I had the misfortune of purchasing on the Steam platform. This game has undoubtedly provided me with one of the most abysmal gaming experiences on Steam, and I have outlined the extensive reasons for my negative critique below:

First and foremost, the game suffers from severe technical issues. Throughout my gameplay sessions, I encountered a myriad of crashes, stutters, and connectivity problems that severely hindered the fluidity and overall playability of the game. For a multiplayer competitive shooter, stable servers and smooth gameplay are paramount, yet Overwatch 2 fails spectacularly in delivering on these fronts.

Furthermore, the game's lackluster content is deeply disappointing. In comparison to its predecessor, Overwatch 2 brings virtually no innovation or advancement to the table. The meager number of new heroes and maps are utterly devoid of any notable design elements. This quickly results in the game becoming monotonous and tiresome, lacking the necessary content to engage players over an extended period.

Additionally, the interaction between the game's community and its developers is practically non-existent. It appears that the developers have turned a blind eye to player feedback and suggestions, resulting in a plethora of lingering issues left unresolved. This dearth of communication and engagement leaves players feeling neglected and dismissed, further eroding any interest or support for the game.

In summary, my scathing review of Overwatch 2 cannot adequately convey the depth of my disappointment and frustration. This game's abysmal performance in technical aspects, lack of content innovation, and absence of meaningful player interaction render it utterly unworthy of both time and money. I sincerely hope that the game's developers will earnestly reflect on these criticisms and take proactive steps to rectify the game's myriad shortcomings; otherwise, Overwatch 2 will forever remain a woeful footnote in my gaming history.

Всегда с друзьями шутили, что выйди игра в стиме - её засрут херовыми отзывами в первые дни! И мол только крысятническая политика конторы, где запрещены отзывы и недоступны цифры онлайна, позволяет игре жить в некой неопределенности, где те, кто играют давно - как бы вкурсе, но для всех остальных у игры "все хорошо".  Кто же знал, что это окажется не рофл...

На деле тут даже комментировать нечего, игра пробила дно. Контора прилагает все силы, чтобы в эту игру никто не играл, от киберспорта до баланса и контента. 

У игры, наверное худшее сообщество, которое я видел за весь свой опыт в шутерах и прочих онлайн играх - псевдотолератные крысы, по факту анскильные упыри получившие: "власть, которая и не снилась моему отцу"! Их воспитала сама близард, своей политикой и поощрением.

Вот реальный плюс игры - это её медийка в виде мультов (до выхода ОВ2) и наверное один из лучших интерфейсов в шутерах. Игра в целом выглядит дорого - все анимации, обратная связь с персонажем: стрельба, мувмент и т.д - это на высшем уровне

顺便打听一下风暴英雄什么时候上steam？

Je me rappelle de cette époque. J'avais vu Overwatch et comment beaucoup de monde, j'étais hypé par le jeu. Je savourais chaque week end gratuit que Blizzard laissait à la communauté pour y jouer. Puis j'ai acheté le jeu. Pour moi, Overwatch a eu beaucoup de places dans mes souvenirs. De ses parties enflammé, de ses heures de farm pour avoir les skins que on voulait, nos moments de rages, etc... Alors j'étais aussi hypé à l'annonce du 2ème opus qui nous promettait une campagne solo. Ça tombe bien, j'aime le lore et le PvP commençait à me lasser.

Puis les années ont passés, j'ai changé, j'ai grandi et Overwatch aussi. Overwatch 2 est finalement sorti et c'est comme si vous recroisez un vieille ami... un vieille ami qui a mal tournée forcé de se prostituer pour quelques billets pour tonton Bobby Kotick. Ça fait des mois, même des années que le jeu n'a plus de contenu pour au final ça ?
On nous avait promis un nouveau jeu, on a eu un reskin qui ferait passer Activision et Electronic Arts pour des maternelles. On nous avait promis un PvE, un PvE qui fut annulé tuant même la seule intérêt de cette opus, jetant le travail de développeur qui sont pas du tout fatigué, pour au final nous laisser des petits missions à la con. Vendu 15 €, que les joueurs du 1 n'ont pas, et qui, à l'heure actuelle, et j'espère qu'ils vont se dépécher, ne sont même pas utilisables si vous l'achetez sur Steam. Et pas remboursable. Même pendant la grêve des scénaristes, ils arrivent encore à écrire une nouvelle saison de procès. Parce oui ce qui marche bien, c'est la boutique avec son pass de combat abusif qui est un taff à mi-temps et toutes les skins du 1, ben on passe à caisse. C'est vrai que Activision Blizzard King est un petit studio indépendant et que l'argent dépensé nous permet de financer les développeurs qui se démène pour le jeu et pas le 13e yacht de Bobby. N'est-ce pas ?

Et pour tout ses années à passer du temps sur ce jeu, nous avons rien en compensation. On nous avait promis tant de choses pour au final, rien du tout. Une pure arnaque. Vous pouvez y jouer : Ça reste un bon jeu si vous évitez tous les paywalls qui mettrait K.O. Max Payne tellement il faudrait des bullets time. Mais pour moi, cette licence est déchu. Mais le gars qui avait dit que les artistes qui faisait du contenu porno sur le jeu faisait bien mieux, ben il avait pas tort. Car la différence entre eux et Blizzard, c'est que l'un font du contenu pour la passion pour des passionnées avec juste un tirelire sur le coté pour l'aider à finir leur fin de mois et l'autre c'est juste Activision Blizzard.
